name: Dutch Van Der Linde
cause_of_death: Committed suicide by falling off of a cliff
quotes: They're chasing us hard, because we represent everything that they fear.
Who Amongst You Is With Me, And Who Is Betraying Me?
This Place… Ain't No Such Thing As Civilized
You Have Got To Keep Faith!
The Game Ain't Over... I Ain't Played My Final Move
I Will Keep Trying, And You'll Keep Doubting Me, And We’ll Keep Failing
There Ain't No Freedom For No One In This Country No More
We Rob Uncle Sam, And We Leave. The Poetry Of It All
One more big score, we got enough money to leave.
We just need to put some more money in our pockets...
It's nice to see you again, John.
I think that's what they call 'two for the price of one' out here in this wonderful place!
Now, would you kindly send that academic out here, so we can show him what we really think about the art of anthropology.
But I can't give up neither. I can't fight my own nature. That's the paradox, John. You see?
When I'm gone, they'll just find another monster. They have to. Because they have to justify their wages.
Our time is passed, John.
description: The leader of a sizeable gang of outlaws and misfits. Idealistic, anarchic, charismatic, well-read, well-lived, but possibly starting to unravel under the pressures of the encroaching modern world.

name: Hosea Matthews
cause_of_death: Shot by agent Milton in the chest
quotes: I wish I had acquired wisdom at less of a price.
Anyway, I got caught by some hill country sheriff, stealing a chicken I think it was... And he decided I was going to be hanged for it.
I've excused you quite enough! Go sleep it off, you drunk, is that clear!?
If we don't stop soon we'll all be dying.
My Pa used to say if you stare into the fire long enough, you can see the whole world pass by.

We're born with some dreams. We acquire others as we get older and we live out something else. When I was...a kid back east they said there were dragons in the west. Dragons! Well, I guess we found them. Found them or made them or...became them. Oh, these futile lives of petty sin we have lived! What choice did we have, really?
description: A master con artist, gentleman and thief, Hosea has been Dutch's closest friend and right-hand man for over twenty years. Intelligent and quick-witted, he can talk his way into, or out of, just about anything.

name: Molly O'Shea
cause_of_death: Shot in the stomach with a shotgun by Susan Grimshaw
quotes: you're playing a dangerous game.
I won't be ignored, Dutch van der Linde. I aren't him... I ain't her, or any of your stooges! You don't owe me nothing. I don't owe you nothing. Nothing!
description: A Dublin girl and the object of Dutch’s affection, for now at least, Molly is too high-strung for a life on the run and it’s all starting to take a toll on her.

name: Susan Grimshaw
cause_of_death: Shot by Micah Bell in the stomach
quotes: I swear half of you would just rot in your own filth, if nobody kept you in check.
description: The undisputed boss and arbiter of justice in the camp, everything would have fallen apart years ago without Susan in charge. Tenacious and iron-willed, she stands for no nonsense.

name: Simon Pearson
quotes: The people are happy and well fed. I think perhaps we'll be ok.
description: The  camp’s butcher and cook, Pearson served a short stint in the navy that he likes to talk about at length. A loud, jolly degenerate who is somewhat in denial about the turn his life has taken.

name: Micah Bell III
quotes: I believe there's winners and losers... and nothing else besides.
How about you and me go and redistribute some property?
I make the money, not wash the clothes.
Sons of Dutch, makes us brothers...and sometimes brothers make mistakes.
Hello, Scarface.
Snake? Okay, and you’re a vulture! Robbing Dutch after all he’s done for you!
You're not better than me, Morgan! Damn you!
Hey, Redskin. Go fetch me something to eat.
I shot a lot of folk like you.
He's sick, he's dying, he's talking crazy.
Oh, Black Lung, you ain't gonna reach that gun. You ain't. You've lost, my sick friend. You lost.
You got me pretty good, Black Lung...
You shot me...you shot me pretty good...
description: A career criminal and hitman. Wild and unpredictable but he lives for the action.

name: Charles Smith
quotes: The amount of hell we've raised, we're owed some back.
description: A relatively recent recruit to the gang, Charles is quiet and reserved but extremely competent in everything he does and virtually unbeatable in a fight. A decent, honest man who also happens to be deadly.

name: Bill Williamson
cause_of_death: Either shot by Abraham Reyes or John Marston
quotes: Don't try anything stupid and we won't do anything unkind.
Go away now, John. Don't make me kill you.
Do I look like I need saving?
You implore me? You implore me? You always were one for fancy words.
Implores. I, I implores you to go back and tell them to send someone just a little bit more impressive next time.
You always did have a high opinion of yourself, John. Dutch always said you were an arrogant son of a bitch!
Jack probably ain't even your son. Ha Ha!
Nobody wanted you around, John!
Dutch, Javier and I wanted you dead! We all did.
So what do they eat in Australia?
This time, I'll make sure you're dead!
description: An ex-soldier discharged from the army, possibly dishonorably. Hot headed, he tends to act first and think later but is tough, dedicated and always ready to fight.

name: Leopold Strauss
cause_of_death: Strauss was captured by the Pinkertons and interrogated. He died in custody without revealing any information about the gang.
quotes: It's a nasty world out there, and it's catching up with us...
description: Originally hailing from Austria, Herr Strauss is responsible for keeping the gang’s books and running their money lending operation. A serious, somewhat shifty and unemotional man, he has all the qualities a loan shark needs.

name: John Marston
cause_of_death: Shot by Edgar Ross, U.S. Army and U.S. Marshals multiple times outside his barn at his ranch.
quotes: Guess about all I got left now is doubts. Doubts and scars.
Some trees flourish, others die. Some cattle grow strong, others are taken by wolves. Some men are born rich enough and dumb enough to enjoy their lives. Ain't nothing fair. You know that.
I just know that there are two theories when arguing with women. And neither one works.
I treated Jack bad, Abigail too. I didn’t want to believe he was mine.
We should have killed him months ago!
description: Once an orphaned street kid taken under Dutch's wing at the age of twelve, John has always had to live by his wits. Shrewd, fearless and strong-willed, he and Arthur are Dutch’s proudest protégés.

name: Abigail Roberts
voiced_by: Sophia Marzocchi and Cali Elizabeth Moore
quotes: If they so much as put one bruise on him I swear, I'll bring the fires of hell on them myself.
description: An orphan who grew up scraping out a living in dive bars and brothels in the West, Abigail is a strong, straight-talking woman who has seen a lot of life and knows what it takes to survive against the odds.

name: Jack Marston
voiced_by: Josh Blaylock, Marissa Buccianti and Ted Sutherland
quotes: Did you catch the bad guys?
My pa knew Landon Ricketts, friend!
I'm John Marston - Jr.
When you meet my pa in hell, tell him I said 'hi'!
Now do you believe I'm a Marston?
Go ahead! I got nothin' to live for, anyway!
I'm John Marston's boy!
description: Young Jack has grown up with the gang, although everyone has done their best to shield him from the more nefarious elements, especially his mother Abigail. He loves everything about nature and the outdoor life, and is carefully watched over by his many aunts and uncles.

name: Karen Jones
quotes: Running scams, robbing banks, screwing over the rich and horrible.
description: A consummate scam artist and trigger woman who can drink pretty much anybody under the table. Bold and full of fun, she loves the outlaw life and wouldn’t have it any other way.

name: Javier Escuella
cause_of_death: Either shot by John Marston or captured by agents.
quotes: If we have to fight, we fight. If we have to run, we'll run. If we must die, we'll die, but... We'll stay free.
If we have to fight, we fight. If we have to run, we’ll run. If we must die, we’ll die. But … we’ll stay free.
description: A notorious bounty hunter and Mexican revolutionary. Javier immediately had a strong connection to Dutch’s ideals. Very committed, passionate and loyal.

name: Tilly Jackson
quotes: Most of us grew up hungry and scared and alone, one way or another.
description: An outlaw from the age of 12, Tilly ran with another gang before joining up with Dutch. Savvy, resilient and dependable, she can more than handle herself and isn’t afraid to speak her mind.

name: Uncle
cause_of_death: Shot in the chest by a group of soldiers during the attack on Marston's Ranch.
voiced_by: Spider Madison, John O'Creagh and James McBride.
quotes: People call me lazy. I'm not lazy. Just don't like working. There's a difference.
If you find yourself in a hole, the first thing to do is to stop digging’.
description: A hanger-on and good-time guy, Uncle is always around when the whiskey is open and never around when there’s any work to be done. If he wasn’t so entertaining, Dutch would have cut him loose years ago.

name: Mary-Beth Gaskill
quotes: Gentlemen, I think I've got something good.
description: A kind, good-natured young woman, which makes her the perfect criminal. By the time people realize they’ve been duped, Mary-Beth is already on her way home with the money.

name: Leonard "Lenny" Summers
cause_of_death: Lenny is gunned down and killed by two Pinkerton riflemen while leading the gang's escape on the rooftops during the Saint Denis bank robbery.
quotes: Living free out here, Like this... I wouldn't have it any other way.
description: Young Lenny has been on the run since he was 15 years old after killing the men who murdered his father. Smart, educated, competent and ambitious, he is always ready to do his part.

name: Josiah Trelawny
quotes: How can romance ever be silly? It's all we have.
description: A flamboyant conjurer, conman and trickster, Trelawny is a very hard man to pin down but he’s always able to bring good leads.

name: Reverend Orville Swanson
quotes: I had real suffering and I lost everything, my vocation, my faith, my family ...
Love yourself a fire.
description: An ex clergyman now lost to debauchery, Swanson has fallen a long way from the standards he once set himself. If he hadn’t saved Dutch’s life in the past, it’s unlikely the gang would have kept him around for this long.

name: Sean MacGuire
cause_of_death: Shot to the head from a sniper associated with the Gray Family.
quotes: Just leave it to me. I can talk a dog off a meat wagon.
description: A cocky young Irish thief and stick-up man who comes from a long line of criminals and political dissidents. He always wants a piece of the action and believes in himself…perhaps a little too much.

name: Sadie Adler
quotes: Nobody's taking nothing from me ever again.
description: A widow who is hellbent on taking revenge upon those who killed her husband. Relentless and afraid of nothing and no one. The wrong woman to cross, but very loyal to those she loves.

name: Arthur Morgan
cause_of_death: Either left to die by complications from Tuberculosis and a fight with Micah Bell or stabbed to death by Micah Bell.
quotes: We're thieves in a world that don't want us no more.
You don’t get to live a bad life and have good things happen to you.
Be loyal to what matters.
I guess...I'm afraid.
You are the only feller who got half of their brain eaten by wolves and ended up more intelligent.
I gave you all I had. I did.
John made it... He's the only one. Rest of us... no. But... I tried. In the end... I did.
description: Dutch's most dependable and capable enforcer since he was a boy, the outlaw life is all Arthur has ever known. Sharp, cool-headed, and ruthless, but with his own sense of honor. A man who gets the job done.
